attributes.action: Launch a full inquiry into the potential cover up of the grooming gang scandal.
attributes.additional_details: We believe there are thousands of potential future CSA crimes that can be prevented if the correct action is taken. Any individual proven to be found guilty of being part of a cover up should be dealt with as harshly as the law allows. There should also be increased support for the victims of these horrific gangs.
attributes.background: We would like the government and all mps to support a full public inquiry into the potential cover up of the grooming gang scandal. We believe that local councils and local police forces haven’t investigated this scandal due to a potential backlash. A public enquiry is needed urgently!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
